sourcesContent:
import { Component, ViewEncapsulation } from '@angular/core'; import { fuseAnimations } from '@fuse/animations'; import { AuthService } from 'app/core/auth/auth.service'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector : 'sign-out-split-screen-reversed', templateUrl : './sign-out.component.html', encapsulation: ViewEncapsulation.None, animations : fuseAnimations }) export class SignOutSplitScreenReversedComponent { countdown: number = 5; countdownMapping: any = { '=1' : '# second', 'other': '# seconds' }; /** * Constructor */ constructor( private _authService: AuthService, private _router: Router ) { } }
